definition: heddle (device to form warp in weaving textiles)/Taiwan pr. [zong4]
to sum up/to put together/Taiwan pr. [zong4]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
4th note in pentatonic scale 五音[wu3 yin1], roughly sol/see also 徵|征[zheng1]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence

pinyin: fa1 re4 ban4 xue4 xiao3 ban3 jian3 shao3 zong1 he2 zheng1
containing_words.word: 發熱伴血小板減少綜合徵

pinyin: chang2 yi4 ji1 zong1 he2 zheng1

sentences.english: Psyllium offers benefits in patients with irritable bowel syndrome in primary care.
sentences.chinese: 歐車前在腸易激綜合徵患者的初級保健中療效最佳。

sentences.english: Objective To study the imaging features of Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討靜脈畸形骨肥大綜合徵影像診斷的徵象。

sentences.english: This paper summarizes the nursing experience for 11 cases with locked-in syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 總結11例閉鎖綜合徵患者的早期康復護理經驗。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical manifestation of mitral valve prolapse syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解二尖瓣脫垂綜合徵的臨牀表現。

sentences.english: This study provides an anatomical basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment of tarsal sinus syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 爲臨牀診治跗骨竇綜合徵提供解剖學依據。

sentences.english: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) is defined as a syndrome of ovarian hyperandrogenism and chronic anovulation.
sentences.chinese: 多囊卵巢綜合徵以雄激素過多和持續無排卵爲特徵。

sentences.english: The main pathophysiological changes of patients with PCOS are insulin resistance, hyperinsulinemia and hyperandrogenism.
sentences.chinese: 胰島素抵抗是多囊卵巢綜合徵的主要發病機制之一。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experiences in the diagnosis and therapy of hyperventilation syndrome of yong servicemen.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結青年軍人過度通氣綜合徵的診斷與治療經驗。

sentences.english: The chronic tractive injury at the elbow is the main factor of cubital tunnel syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 慢性肘部牽拉傷是導致肘管綜合徵的主要因素。

sentences.english: To study Dorsolateral Medullary Syndrome with MRI.
sentences.chinese: 應用MRI研究延髓背外側綜合徵。

sentences.english: Methods 82 patients with primary nephrosis syndrom were randomly divided into two groups.
sentences.chinese: 方法將82例原發性腎病綜合徵患者隨機分爲2組。

sentences.english: Hirsutism is frequently a result of PCOS.
sentences.chinese: 多毛症常常是多囊卵巢綜合徵的結果。

sentences.english: This paper summarizes professor Xie Jianqun s clinical experience in the treatment of irritable bowel syndrome(IBS).
sentences.chinese: 總結謝建羣教授從肝脾論治腸易激綜合徵的臨牀經驗。

sentences.english: Please discuss the clinical type and diagnosis standard of nephritic syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 試述腎病綜合徵的臨牀分型及診斷標準。

sentences.english: This patient presented with Cushing's syndrome and hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 這個病人有庫興氏綜合徵和高血壓病史。

sentences.english: Method Trace back and analyze ECG of 50 cases of IPS.
sentences.chinese: 回顧性分析50例間歇性預激綜合徵的心電圖。
